description:
Adobe Photoshop is hands down, the most popular program for creating and modifying images for the web.

This is true not only because Photoshop is available on a wide array of platforms ranging from Mac to Windows to UNIX, but because after four generations of development, Adobe Photoshop has the most intuitive user interface, the most complete set of tools, and the largest number of reference books around.

Learn how to create a Facebook cover in Adobe Photoshop and how to set the correct document sizes.

  • Facebook sizes
  • Adobe Photoshop Layers
  • Adobe Photoshop Type Tool
A powerful tool to use for your marketing campaigns.Suitable for beginners, through this course of 11 Lectures and 30 minutes of content, you'll learn how to create a fast and easy Facebook cover.
title: How to use Photoshop to create a stunning Facebook cover
